message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I believe it's a great deal for you considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can't afford $14,000. I'm willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. Could we meet somewhere in the middle?
Bob, I understand you have a budget, but $12,000 is simply too low. I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is a fair price that gives us both a good deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $12,500. This is the highest I can go while staying within my budget.
